chunks.text: Welcome to DevOps and CI/CD pipelines. DevOps combines development and operations for faster, reliable software delivery.
DevOps culture emphasizes collaboration, automation, and continuous improvement. It breaks down silos between teams.
Version control with Git is fundamental. Branching strategies like GitFlow or GitHub Flow organize development work.
Continuous Integration automatically builds and tests code changes. It catches issues early in the development cycle.
Continuous Delivery automates release processes. Code changes can be deployed to production quickly and safely.
Docker containers package applications with dependencies. They ensure consistency across development and production environments.
Kubernetes orchestrates containers at scale. It handles deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
Infrastructure as Code tools like Terraform and Ansible automate infrastructure provisioning and configuration.
Monitoring and logging are crucial for observability. Tools like Prometheus, Grafana, and ELK stack provide insights.
CI/CD tools include Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions, and CircleCI. They automate build, test, and deploy processes.
Testing in CI/CD includes unit tests, integration tests, and automated UI tests. Quality gates ensure standards are met.
Security should be integrated into DevOps as DevSecOps. Automated security scans catch vulnerabilities early.
DevOps transformation requires cultural change and technical skills. Start small and iterate to build momentum.
